attribs.current: The Agency goon has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, intimidated, or persuaded.

attribs.current: The Agency goon has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, intimidated, or persuaded.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-Nd7ogz1pfJZheo8zONY_description
attribs.current:
Must hit targets AC to work. Target must make a DC14 dex save or become grappled and restrained. 

[[2d4]] slashing upon impact and per round from the razor sharp net. It takes a DC14 strength check to break out or you must do more than 5hp (AC 14) damage to it. 

A restrained creatures speed becomes 0, and it cant benefit from any bonus to its speed.

Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creatures attack rolls have disadvantage.

The creature has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

10ft heavily obscured.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Nd7qbu1XY59BG0pYfZK_description
attribs.current:
Can get it in a helmet or goggles.

See body heat of creatures except those in a different plane of existence or dimension up to 15ft. Including heavily obscured scenarios and walls that are less then 5ft thick.

+1 to all attacks in the dark.
